enableActionIcons.name: Action Icons
enableActionIcons.hint: When enabled the number of actions it would take to move a token will be displayed.

enableDifficultTerrain.name: Difficult Terrain
enableDifficultTerrain.hint: When enabled the additional cost of moving through difficult terrain will be displayed.

enableMovementHistory.name: Movement History
enableMovementHistory.hint: When enabled it will track a token's movement during combat and reset at the start of the token's turn.

fogExploration.name: Fog Exploration Restriction
fogExploration.hint: When enabled pathfinding will be limited to only parts of the map that have been explored.
